sen.j: 若狭局（わかさのつぼね、生年未詳 - 建仁3年（1203年））は、鎌倉時代初期の女性。
sen.e: Wakasa no Tsubone (year of birth unknown - 1203) was a woman who lived during the early Kamakura period.

sen.j: 鎌倉幕府の御家人、比企能員の娘。
sen.e: She was a daughter of Yoshikazu HIKI, a gokenin (an immediate vassal of the shogunate in the Kamakura and Muromachi through Edo periods) of the Kamakura bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).

sen.j: 鎌倉幕府二代将軍源頼家の側室。
sen.e: She was a concubine of the second Shogun of the Kamakura bakufu, MINAMOTO no Yoriie.

sen.j: 頼家の嫡男源一幡の母。
sen.e: She was the mother of Yoriie's legitimate son, MINAMOTO no Ichiman.

sen.j: 父能員は初代将軍源頼朝の乳母・比企尼の甥であり、その縁故によって頼朝の嫡男・頼家の乳母父となった。
sen.e: Her father Yoshikazu was a nephew of Hikinoama, a wet nurse of the first Shogun MINAMOTO no Yoritomo, and through the connection he got the position to nurture Yoritomo's legitimate son, Yoriie.

sen.j: 頼家の側室となった若狭局は建久9年（1198年）、頼家が17歳の時に長子一幡を生む。
sen.e: After she became Yoriie's concubine, she gave birth to their first son, Ichiman, in 1198 when Yoriie was 17.

sen.j: 一幡が6歳になった建仁3年（1203年）8月、病となった頼家が危篤状態に陥り、その家督相続を巡り若狭局の一族比企氏と、頼家の母方の外戚北条氏との対立による比企能員の変が起こる。
sen.e: When Ichiman turned six in September 1203, Yoriie, who had been ill in bed, fell into critical condition, then the Conspiracy of Yoshikazu HIKI occurred due to the rivalry between the Hiki clan on Wakasa no Tsubone's side and the Hojo clan, Yoriie's maternal relative, over the succession to the position of family head.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴では「建仁３年８月」→「1203年９月」でした。

sen.j: 9月2日、能員が北条時政によって謀殺され、知らせを受けて一幡の屋敷である小御所に立て籠もった。
sen.e: After Yoshikazu was murdered by Tokimasa HOJO on October 15, the Hiki family was informed of Yoshikazu's deatn and took refuge in Kogosho, Ichiman's residence.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処（文の主語は、分割したセル１５の主語「比企一族」です。）；グレゴリオ歴では「建仁３年９月２日」→「1203年10月15日」でした。
sen.e: After Yoshikazu was murdered by Tokimasa HOJO on October 15, the Hiki family was informed of Yoshikazu's death and took refuge in Kogosho, Ichiman's residence.
sen.cmt: スペルミスと思われる箇所を訂正しました。
sen.e: After Yoshikazu was murdered by Tokimasa HOJO on October 15, the Hiki family was informed of Yoshikazu's death and took refuge in Kogosho, Ichiman's residence.

sen.j: 比企一族は北条義時率いる大軍に攻められ、屋敷に火を放って自害し、一族は滅亡した。
sen.e: However, they were attacked by the massive army led by Yoshitoki HOJO, so they set fire to the residence to commit suicide, which led to the fall of the family.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: However, the Hiki family was attacked by a large number of army led by Yoshitoki HOJO, then the members of Hiki clan set fire to the residence to commit suicide, which led to extinction of the family.
sen.cmt: 二文を「ーso, ー」とsoを用いるのは口語的ですので訂正しました。滅亡は「fall」で問題ないとも言えますが、完全に家系が途絶えたということでさらにはっきりとした「extinction」を用いました。
sen.e: However, the Hiki family was attacked by a large number of army led by Yoshitoki HOJO, then the members of Hiki clan set fire to the residence to commit suicide, which led to extinction of the family.

sen.j: 『吾妻鏡』では一幡と若狭局もその時焼死したとしているが、『愚管抄』によると一幡は母が抱いて逃げ延びたが、11月になって北条義時の手の者によって刺し殺されたという。
sen.e: "Azuma Kagami" (The Mirror of the East) says that Ichiman and Wakasa no Tsubone were burned to death at that time, but "Gukansho" (Jottings of a Fool) says that although she barely escaped with Ichiman in her arms at that time, Ichiman was stabbed to death by Yoshitoki HOJO's retainers in December, the same year.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴では「建仁３年11月」→「1203年12月」でした。
sen.e: "Azuma Kagami" (The Mirror of the East) describes that Ichiman and Wakasa no Tsubone were burned to death at that time, while "Gukansho" (Jottings of a Fool) mentions that she escaped the attack with Ichiman in her arms, yet to be stabbed to death by the hand of Yoshitoki HOJO's retainers in December.
sen.cmt: 文の流れで一部読みづらい部分があります。特に接続詞「that」と「although」が続いている部分です。修正し、簡略化しました。
